sentence: Abrams ran for governor in 2018 and lost to Georgia's current governor, Brian Kemp, a Republican, though she never conceded.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Is It Possible Not Even Stacey Abrams Wants to Associate with Joe Biden?

sentence: Abrams ran for governor in 2018 and lost to Georgia's current governor, Brian Kemp, a Republican, though she never conceded.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Is It Possible Not Even Stacey Abrams Wants to Associate with Joe Biden?

sentence: If 20-year career politician Brian Kemp spent half as much time protecting Georgia's elections as he does scheming to hold on to his office, we wouldn't be in this mess.? In a statement, Kemp's campaign spokesman, Cody Hall, said: It's no surprise that David Perdue and Stacey Abrams are joining forces to maintain the blatantly unfair status quo and continue raising money for their campaigns when the Governor is prohibited by law from doing so, solely because he is the incumbent during a legislative session.
title: Stacey Abrams, David Perdue call foul on GOP proposal to ban fundraising while Georgia legislature is in session

sentence: If 20-year career politician Brian Kemp spent half as much time protecting Georgia's elections as he does scheming to hold on to his office, we wouldn't be in this mess.? In a statement, Kemp's campaign spokesman, Cody Hall, said: It's no surprise that David Perdue and Stacey Abrams are joining forces to maintain the blatantly unfair status quo and continue raising money for their campaigns when the Governor is prohibited by law from doing so, solely because he is the incumbent during a legislative session.
title: Stacey Abrams, David Perdue call foul on GOP proposal to ban fundraising while Georgia legislature is in session

sentence: We can't control polls that will more than likely underestimate the power of Georgia's voters of color or the commentary from pundits who were wrong about Georgia in 2020 and 2021, but we can make sure Georgians learn about the record of our eventual opponent, whether it's Brian Kemp, David Perdue, or Kandiss Taylor,? said Seth Bringman, an Abrams campaign spokesman.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans lead Abrams in Georgia: poll
